text: The Daikyo Palm Meadows Cup was a golf tournament held in Australia from 1988 to 1992 at the Palm Meadows Golf Course, Carrara, Queensland. Prize money was A$500,000 in 1988, A$600,000 in 1989, A$800,000 in 1990, A$1,200,000 in 1991 and A$1,400,000 in 1992. ==Winners== {|class=wikitable style="font-size:95%" !Year !! Winner !! Country !! Score !! To par !! Margin of victory !! Runner(s)-up !! Winner's share (A$) !!
